thread.title: Zodiak Kids secures sales for Amazon Programming
thread.title_full: Zodiak Kids secures sales for Amazon Programming

title: Zodiak Kids secures sales for Amazon Programming
text:
Editor | 05 October 2015 
French content firm Zodiac Kids has secured sales for the Amazon Studios series it took on for distribution at MIPCOM 2014. 
The content firm will distribute three Amazon series: pre-school series Tumble Leaf (seasons one and two); Creative Galaxy (seasons one and two); live-action series Gortimer Gibbon's Life on Normal Street (seasons one and two). In Canada DHX Media has picked up all seasons of Gortimer Gibbon's Life on Normal Street for its The Family Channel and Knowledge Network has taken Tumble Leaf and Creative Galaxy (both season one) for its preschool slots, both 13 episodes each. Tumble Leaf and Creative Galaxy (both season one) have also been picked up by Mediacorp (Singapore) and ITI Neovision (Poland). 
In Australia ABC has secured the rights to all seasons of Gortimer Gibbon's Life on Normal Street and in Thailand Thai PBS has taken the first season of all three series, Tumble Leaf, Creative Galaxy and Gortimer Gibbon's Life on Normal Street.
